articles.title: US: COVID-19 cases among children peaked in September, shows data - WION
articles.description: New data shows that September was the worst month in the US for new cases and deaths. Data from the American Academy of Pediatrics reveals that cases among children peaked in September, as many schools opened for offline classes amid growing cases of delta va…
